posts.title: CTF: SSRF Filter Bypass Notes
posts.summary: Walkthrough of lenient SSRF filters and common misconfig pitfalls.
posts.bodyHtml:
I explored SSRF filter bypasses including DNS rebinding, URL scheme confusion, and leveraging internal redirects. Key lessons:

  • Always use allowlists (schemes + hosts)
  • Normalize + re-parse URLs
  • Block redirects or re-validate
